application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T.1 (2303) Common Lime - Reduce to low pollard (extensive cavity at base).T.19 (2316) Wild Cherry - Reduce crown overall by 3-4m (cavity at base).T.20 Wild Cherry - Cut down to 2m stump (collapsing).T.48 (2362) Hornbeam - Reduce crown by 2-3m (over extended).T.49 Group of 5 trees including Goat Willow & Sycamore - Fell.T.50 Crack Willow - Fell both stems (included union at base and severe decay).T.51 Silver Birch - Fell (as leaning).T.54 (2135)  English Oak - 2m Lateral reduction & reshape away from adjacent house.T.72 (2214) Horse Chestnut - Reduce major limb over road back in line with main crown break 3m.T.74 Common Lime - 3-4m Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points.
